About Me

Hi, my name is Dragana and I am a WordPress Expert Junior. My first contact with WordPress was at IT Bootcamp where I learned almost everything I know now. After successfully completing the course, I continued to improve my knowledge and started working as a freelancer. I have created dozens of websites and web shops and looking forward to new projects. Be free to contact me for any questions.
